main: ^Uh...you've got a little something under your nose.
Continue: ^I think they're allergies. I don't know what they're caused by, but I can't stop sniffling. <i> ACHOO!<i>
^It's just so annoying... I can't go ten seconds without sneezing, it's driving me crazy! <i> ACHOO!<i>
^Oh, I totally get what you mean! I'm allergic to tons of things.
^I'm so sorry! I hope you find a way to stop them.
Agree: ^Finding the source of them will definitely help.
Suggest: ^You're right. I guess I should start from moving out of this flower patch, huh.
Help: ^Thanks! I have a few places in mind, so let's go.
^[Click on a place for hamster to move to!]
